channel.title: Data Science Portfolio on Paul John Cronin
channel.description: Recent content in Data Science Portfolio on Paul John Cronin

item.title: Discrete Optimization
item.description: Discrete optimisation is the set of powerful and versatile techniques primarily dealing with problems where the feasible solutions comprise a finite or countably infinite set. These problems can be broadly classified into two categories: combinatorial & integer optimisation. Combinatorial optimisation include the travelling salesman and the knapsack problems. Integer optimisation problems require finding the best integer-valued solution to an optimisation problem that may involve linear or nonlinear objective functions and constraints.

item.title: Coding
item.description: My coding proficiency includes both Python, R and SQL, as well as their libraries. Python libraries (Python’s key datastructures are dataframes) NumPy (core scientific computing in Python) Pandas (built on NumPy, easy-to-use data structures and analysis) Sklearn R dplyr Australian Energy Market Operator (AEMO) This work was the CAPSTONE project for my Master’s degree in DataScience at UNSW. It worked with the Australian Energy Market Operator (AEMO), to be able to predict the different Australian states’ energy demands at different future moments.

item.title: Data mining & machine learning
item.description: Data mining and machine learning skills include classification, clustering, regression and predictive analytics. Regression projects Australian Energy Market Operator (AEMO) This work was the CAPSTONE project for my Master’s degree in DataScience at UNSW. It worked with the Australian Energy Market Operator (AEMO), to be able to predict the different Australian states’ energy demands at different future moments. While this was a team project, each individual member was assigned different duties; my duties included the linear model (LM) as well as the generalized linear model (GLM).

item.title: Data visualisation & technical communication
item.description: Data visualisation skills includes utilising software and analytical skills to create a graphic record of data that is processed and organised. Data visualisation & technical communication is more than just python graphs - it requires communicating technical ideas clearly, effectively. My data visualisation experience includes Tableau, as well as many scientific papers and patents. Tableau (Data Visualization) This tableau data exploration was to investigate the claimed link between COVID vaccinations and death.

item.title: Neural networks & deep learning
item.description: Tree and Ensemble Learning Classification via regression trees and neural networking This paper examines the classification of abalone age by specific physical measurements, as well as the categorical variable of sex, into four different age classes. Decision trees with pre-pruning and post-pruning, ensemble methods such as bagging and pasting, as well as neural network models were employed to examine this question. A GridSearchCV was used to find the optimal neural network hyperparameters.

item.title: Neural networks & deep learning
item.description: Tree and Ensemble Learning Classification via regression trees and neural networking This paper examines the classification of abalone age by specific physical measurements, as well as the categorical variable of sex, into four different age classes. Decision trees with pre-pruning and post-pruning, ensemble methods such as bagging and pasting, as well as neural network models were employed to examine this question. A GridSearchCV was used to find the optimal neural network hyperparameters.

item.title: Statistics
item.description: Mathematical skills Data science deals heavily with numbers, including algorithms, statistical data and mathematical formulas for quantifying and processing data. This section discusses my statistical mathematical skills, especially in applied mathematics. This includes algorithmic and logarithmic studies, statistical computations and calculus. Monte Carlo modelling This paper explores various aspect of Monte Carlo algorithms on methylation data, including: plotting density functions, implementing an accept/reject algorithm, and computing theoretical and modeled acceptance rates.

item.title: Database systems
item.description: Database systems are more than just a working knowledge of SQL, but include Hadoop, MapReduce, MRJob, Hive and Spark. Technical skills are among the hard skills that employers can require when hiring a data scientist. Statistical data, platforms for visualising data, processing software and open-source and closed source programs can be common technical skills that a data scientist may possess. Relational Database Design This project was to design a relational database to keep track of bookings for a number of AirBNB locations, and produce a diagram of the tables and the connections between them.

item.title: About Paul John Cronin
item.description: Hi! My name is Paul John Cronin, and I'm a Data Scientist. While I’ve only recently graduated a Masters in Data Science from UNSW, I have had a long career working with data. I also have a PhD in Physics from the University of Sydney, as well as bachelor degrees in Engineering, Mathematics & Science. Education Testamur Transcript Description Masters of Data Science, awarded with Excellence (UNSW) PhD in Physics (USYD) Bachelor of Engineering, awarded with 1st Class Honors, and the University Medal (USYD) Bachelor of Science (USYD) Career I have had the good fortune to work for the following companies:
